level.text: If DDOE approves an applicant's status as a non-responsible person pursuant to § 8-633.02, the participant's status as a non-responsible person continues upon acquiring an interest in the eligible property.
Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, a non-responsible person is not liable for existing contamination at the eligible property.
A non-responsible person shall be liable for new contamination that the person causes or contributes to, and any exacerbation of existing contamination at the eligible property.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 18-369 substituted "DDOE" for "EHA" wherever it appeared.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2(a) of Brownfield Revitalization Emergency Amendment Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-667, December 28, 2010, 58 DCR 95).
